wikipedia_page.main: William Harry Gooney (8 October 1910 – 11 June 1978) known as Harry Gooney was an English footballer who played as a wing half.

response: Sampy was made club captain during the 1930–31 season but lost his place and the captaincy to Harry Gooney a year later. Regaining his place in the first team during the 1932–33 season, Sampy remained a regular with United until 1934.
